name: Wages
clip_n_ship_disag_description: global wages were applied equally to each region.

name: Areas of observed blast (dynamite) fishing
description:
Destructive artisanal blast fishing (Reefs at Risk Revisited).

Data sources:

- [Reefs at Risk Revisited](http://www.wri.org/publication/reefs-at-risk-revisited)
clip_n_ship_disag_description: global scores were applied equally to each region.

name: Areas of observed poison fishing
description:
Destructive artisanal poison (cyanide) fishing (Reefs at Risk Revisited).

Data sources:

- [Reefs at Risk Revisited](www.wri.org/publication/reefs-at-risk-revisited)
clip_n_ship_disag_description: global scores were applied equally to each region.

name: High bycatch caused by artisanal fishing
description:
The presence of destructive artisanal blast and poison (cyanide) fishing (Reefs at Risk Revisited).

Data sources:

- [Reefs at Risk Revisited](http://www.wri.org/publication/reefs-at-risk-revisited)
clip_n_ship_disag_description: global pressures data were applied equally to all regions.

name: High bycatch artisanal fishing practices as a proxy for subtidal hard bottom habitat destruction
description:
The presence of destructive artisanal blast fishing (Reefs at Risk Revisited).

Data sources:

- [Reefs at Risk Revisited](http://www.wri.org/publication/reefs-at-risk-revisited)
clip_n_ship_disag_description: global pressures data were applied equally to all regions.

name: Used to weight elements of coastal protection goal
description: Habitat extent multiplied by habitat protection rank for: coral, mangrove (offshore and inland 1km), saltmarsh, sea ice (shoreline), and seagrass
clip_n_ship_disag_description: global pressures data were applied equally to all regions.

name: Used to weight elements of carbon storage goal
description: Habitat extent mulitiplied by habitat carbon storage capacity for: mangrove, saltmarsh and seagrass
clip_n_ship_disag_description: global habitat extent was applied to each region after weighting by each region's offshore area to 3nm.

name: Travel warnings
description:
Countries with US State Department travel warnings.

Data sources:

- [U.S. Department of State](http://travel.state.gov/content/passports/english/alertswarnings.html)
